Portuguese: Te desejo o máximo de sorte em sua jornada, mas já te adianto que o Pico da Tempestade é de arrepiar os cabelos. Só entre se estiver realmente preparado.

English: Many dangers lie ahead... but I trust you to take them head on and emerge victorious, warrior. Enter the Storm Peak and find out what lies ahead.
Portuguese: Muitos perigos estão à sua frente... mas confio em você para enfrentá-los de frente e sair vitorioso, guerreiro. Entre no Pico Tempestuoso e descubra o que o aguarda.

English: It is not too late to turn back, entering the Storm Peak is almost certain death.
Portuguese: Ainda dá pra dar meia-volta, entrar no Pico da Tempestade é como assinar seu próprio atestado de óbito.

English: Heh!? What is one of your kind doing here? I haven't seen any living creatures other than these puppets of Shade for years now...
Portuguese: Heh!? O que um ser como você tá fazendo por aqui? Já faz anos que só vejo esses fantoches da Shade..

English: Head inside the Storm Peak when you are ready.
Portuguese: Entre no Pico Tempestuoso quando estiver pronto.

English: Speak with Rankashin.
Portuguese: Fale com Rankashin.

English: A New Weapon Part 2
Portuguese: Uma Nova Arma - Parte 2

English: A Harey Situation
Portuguese: Uma Situação Complicada

English: So a Dwarpet named Rankashu sent you to look for scraps that could be used to build another weapon... interesting. I have lived my life reflecting on the effects of the last time the Dwarpets made a weapon... the Clockworks.
Portuguese: Então um Dwarpet chamado Rankashu te mandou em uma missão de procurar sucatas para construir outra arma... interessante. Eu passadei minha vida toda refletindo sobre as consequências da última vez que os Dwarpetes inventaram uma arma... o Clockworks.

English: Creating the Clockworks weapon brought Madrigal salvation... until Shade turned our weapon against us. The Clockworks rampaged throughout the lands, destroying villages and the people who lived in them. Clockworks was eventually contained... but is no longer a threat to Shade.
Portuguese: A criação da arma Clockworks trouxe salvação para Madrigal... até que Shade virou o jogo e usou nossa própria arma contra nós. O Clockworks saiu devastando tudo por onde passava, arrasando vilarejos e quem cruzasse seu caminho. No final das contas, conseguimos conter o Clockworks... mas agora ele não é mais uma ameaça pra Shade.

English: All the other Dwarpets have long died or left the Storm Peak... but perhaps with your help, we can gather materials to build a new weapon to stop Shade once and for all.
Portuguese: Todos os outros Dwarpetes já morreram ou deixaram o Pico Tempestuoso há muito tempo... mas talvez, com a sua ajuda, possamos reunir materiais para construir uma nova arma e deter a Shade de uma vez por todas.

English: Frozen Hare Guards have completely blocked off the path leading deeper within the mountains. If you can take down their leader we can make a foothold further ahead.
Portuguese: Os Guardas Lebres Congelados montaram uma barreira congelante bloqueando o caminho que leva ainda mais fundo nas montanhas. Se você acabar com o chefe deles, poderemos avançar mais adiante.

English: You were my one hope of continuing work on a new weapon... please reconsider.
Portuguese: Você era a minha última esperança de seguir em frente com a criação de uma nova arma... por favor, repense essa decisão.

English: Well done! With the Frozen Hare Assassin out of the way we can continue to explore.
Portuguese: Muito bem! Com o Assassino Lebre Congelado fora do caminho, podemos continuar a explorar.

English: Eliminate 30 Frozen Hare Guards and their leader, the Frozen Hare Assassin.
Portuguese: Elimine 30 Guardas Lebre Congelados e o líder deles, o Assassino Lebre Congelado.

English: Kill 30 Frozen Hare Guard and 1 Frozen Hare Assassin.
Portuguese: Mate 30 Guardas Lebre Congelados e 1 Assassino Lebre Congelado.

English: Building a Weapon
Portuguese: Forjando uma Arma

English: With the guards out of our hair we can start collecting supplies to start building a brand new weapon!
Portuguese: Agora que os guardas tão de fora do nosso pé, podemos sair por aí juntando materiais pra criar uma arma novinha em folha!

English: The Enraged Yetti and Saphyryan Hounds that live in the valley below have weapons and armor we can use to forge the basis of a mechanical beast like Clockworks.
Portuguese: Os Yettis Enfurecidos e Saphyryan Perseguidores que habitam o vale abaixo têm equipamentos e armaduras que podemos usar como base para forjar uma besta mecânica poderosa, tipo o Clockworks.

English: Head down to the valley and collect Yetti Hammers and Hound Harnesses, they'll come in handy for crafting...
Portuguese: Desça até o vale e colete Martelos de Yetti e Arnês de Perseguidores, eles serão úteis para a criação...

English: The hounds only bite a little bit...
Portuguese: Os perseguidores só mordem um pouquinho...

English: Yes, this will do nicely! I can start forging a new Clockworks with these materials. But there's one thing we're missing...
Portuguese: Sim, isso vai ficar perfeito! Posso começar a forjar um novo Clockworks com esses materiais. Mas tem uma coisa que está faltando...

English: Collect Yetti Hammers and Hound Harnesses from the masquerpets in the valley below.
Portuguese: Colete Martelos de Yetti e Arnês de Perseguidores dos masquerpets no vale abaixo.

English: Collect 30 Yetti Hammers from the Enraged Yetti, and 15 Hound Harness from the Saphyryan Hounds.
Portuguese: Colete 30 Martelos de Yetti dos Yettis Enfurecidos e 15 Arnês de Perseguidores dos Saphyryan Perseguidores.

English: Army of the Dead
Portuguese: Legião dos Mortos

English: These armaments are a good foundation to work off of for now... but to bring a new Clockworks to life, we need a powerful core of energy.
Portuguese: Esses armamentos são uma boa base para trabalhar... mas para dar vida a um novo Clockworks, precisamos de um núcleo poderoso de energia.

English: When the masquerpets invaded Storm Peak, the Crystal Demon Lord led an army of undead deep within the mountains and sealed away the last known energy core produced by my people...
Portuguese: Quando os masquerpets invadiram o Pico da Tempestade, o Lorde Demônio de Cristal comandou um exército de mortos-vivos adentrando as profundezas da montanha e lacrou o último núcleo de energia fabricado pelo meu povo.

English: The Demon Lord hides behind its skeletal minions, so to even have a chance at retriving the energy core we will need to eliminate the Skeletal Militants along with the Skeleton General.
Portuguese: O Lorde Demônio se esconde atrás dos seus capangas esqueléticos, então, pra ter a mínima chance de pegar de volta o núcleo de energia, vamos ter que eliminar os Militantes Esqueléticos junto com o General Esqueleto.

English: The Skeletal Militants are formidable foes. The Skeleton General is said to use sharp blades affixed to its back to rip through anything that gets in its way.
Portuguese: Os Militantes Esqueléticos são inimigos formidáveis. Dizem que o General Esqueleto usa lâminas afiadas presas em suas costas para rasgar qualquer coisa que apareça em seu caminho.

English: There's no way we can get to the Demon Lord without first killing its minions...
Portuguese: Não tem como chegar no Lorde Demônio sem dar um fim nos seus capangas.

English: Your power is tremendous! With your help I have made more progress in creating a new Clockworks than I have in my years out here on my own.
Portuguese: Seu poder é tremendo! Com sua ajuda, fiz mais progresso na criação de um novo Clockworks do que em todos os meus anos aqui sozinho.

English: You couldn't find the Skeletal Militants and their general? Head to the valley far below.
Portuguese: Você não conseguiu achar os Militantes Esqueléticos e o general deles? Vá até o vale lá embaixo.

English: Kill 80 Skeletal Militants and the Skeleton General.
Portuguese: Mate 80 Militantes Esqueléticos e o General Esqueleto.

English: Weapon of the Future
Portuguese: Arma do Futuro

English: The dream of building a new weapon to defend Madgrial is starting to feel real. The only thing standing in our way is the Crystal Demon Lord.
Portuguese: O sonho de construir uma nova arma para defender Madrigal está começando a se tornar realidade. A única coisa que está nos impedindo é o Lorde Demônio de Cristal.

English: Go collect the Clockworks Core that the Crystal Demon Lord has been guarding all these years. Once you've collected the Clockworks Core, I'm sure that Rankashu would appreciate an update on your progress...
Portuguese: Vá coletar o Núcleo do Clockworks que o Senhor Demônio de Cristal tem guardado todos esses anos. Assim que você pegar o Núcleo do Clockworks, tenho certeza de que Rankashu ficaria grato por uma atualização sobre o seu progresso.

English: Without the Clockworks Core there is no hope to build a new weapon.
Portuguese: Sem o Núcleo do Clockworks, não há esperança de construir uma nova arma.

English: This is incredible!!! My kin was in Storm Peak all along... and a Clockworks Core was being guarded there, too!? Perhaps the future of Madrigal is brighter than I thought...
Portuguese: Isso é incrível!!! Meus semelhantes estavam no Pico Tempestuoso o tempo todo.. e um Núcleo do Clockworks estava sendo guardado lá também!? Talvez o futuro de Madrigal seja mais promissor do que eu pensava..

English: I will spend my days trying to understand this Clockworks Core, perhaps one day Rankashin and I will successfully create the strongest Clockworks of all time!
Portuguese: Passarei meus dias tentando entender este Núcleo do Clockworks, talvez um dia Rankashin e eu consigamos criar o Clockworks mais poderoso de todos os tempos!

English: Destroy the Crystal Demon Lord so I may finally bring a new Clockworks into the world!
Portuguese: Destrua o Lorde Demônio de Cristal para que eu possa finalmente dar vida a um novo Clockworks!

English: Defeat the Crystal Demon Lord to obtain the Clockworks Core, then return to Rankashu in Darkon.
Portuguese: Derrote o Lorde Demônio de Cristal para obter o Núcleo do Clockworks e depois retorne a Rankashu em Darkon.

English: Hael's Swords
Portuguese: Espadas de Hael

English: Altars of a Dark Clown
Portuguese: Altares de um Palhaço Sombrio

English: Hidden within the walls of the Mars Mine are altars decorated with the symbol of the evil clown goddess, Shade.
Portuguese: Escondidos nas paredes da Mina Mars estão altares decorados com o símbolo da deusa palhaça do mal, Shade.

English: Go visit the mine and see what I mean. The altars all have the symbol of Shade's corruption scattered nearby.
Portuguese: Vá visitar a mina e veja o que quero dizer. Os altares têm o símbolo da corrupção de Shade espalhado por perto.

English: Your curiosity will not go unpunished... to reveal the nature of Shade's power, you must defeat her elite guards within the Mars Mine.
Portuguese: Sua curiosidade não ficará impune... para revelar a natureza do poder de Shade, você deve derrotar seus guardas de elite dentro da Mina Mars.

English: Perhaps this is where your story ends...
Portuguese: Talvez seja aqui que sua história termina...

English: Ah, I can tell you were successful in slaying Shade's elite guards. You're covered in her corrupted energy.
Portuguese: Ah, posso ver que você teve sucesso em matar os guardas de elite de Shade. Você está coberto pela energia corrompida dela.

English: Being in contact with this much purple magic has been known to cause memory loss... perhaps someone with knowledge of these magics could help you before you go mad.
Portuguese: Estar em contato com tanta magia roxa é conhecido por causar perda de memória... talvez alguém com conhecimento dessas magias possa ajudá-lo antes que você enlouqueça.

English: Find and eliminate Shade's elite henchmen within the Mars Mine.
Portuguese: Encontre e elimine os capangas de elite de Shade dentro da Mina Mars.

English: Kill the elite masquerpets upon each of their altars within the Mars Mine.
Portuguese: Mate os mascarpets de elite em cada um de seus altares dentro da Mina Mars.

English: A Reunion to Remember
Portuguese: Uma Reunião para Lembrar

English: Oh you've returned... at least I think I remember you.
Portuguese: Oh, você voltou... pelo menos acho que me lembro de você.

English: You brought me something? Oh, it's a drink... I shouldn't trust you, but for some reason I don't sense any animosity in your aura. I'll take a drink in honor of our reunion today.
Portuguese: Você me trouxe algo? Oh, é uma bebida... eu não deveria confiar em você, mas por algum motivo não sinto animosidade em sua aura. Vou tomar um gole em homenagem ao nosso reencontro hoje.

English: Well it was nice to see you again...
Portuguese: Bem, foi bom ver você de novo...

English: It's all coming back, all the years. A lifetime of adventures are now clear... thanks to you.
Portuguese: Tudo está voltando, todos os anos. Uma vida de aventuras agora está clara... graças a você.

English: Though I can never repay you for restoring my memories, I hope this gift will show my appreciation. Here, take my blades...
Portuguese: Embora eu nunca possa retribuir por restaurar minhas memórias, espero que este presente mostre minha gratidão. Aqui, leve minhas lâminas...

English: Don't worry about me, hero. With my memories in tact again, I can finally fight back against the one who took my mind...
Portuguese: Não se preocupe comigo, herói. Com minhas memórias intactas novamente, finalmente posso lutar contra quem tirou minha mente...

English: Will you let me sip from the cup again?
Portuguese: Você me deixará beber do copo novamente?

English: Help restore Hael's memories.
Portuguese: Ajude a restaurar as memórias de Hael.

English: King of Beasts
Portuguese: Rei das Feras

English: Venomous Vendetta
Portuguese: Vingança Venenosa

English: Have you heard of the legendary King of the Beasts? Brace yourself, adventurer, for he is not one to be easily defeated.
Portuguese: Você já ouviu falar do lendário Rei das Feras? Prepare-se, aventureiro, pois ele não é facilmente derrotado.

English: Before you can even set foot in the presence of the King, you must navigate through a winding path teeming with a vicious monsters.
Portuguese: Antes de você poder sequer se aproximar da presença do Rei, deve navegar por um caminho sinuoso repleto de monstros ferozes.

English: Venture forth and cleanse The Wilds of the fearsome cobras and their master, the Twinstrike Den Mother. Clearing an opening will grant you the breathing space needed to strategize and prepare for what's to come.
Portuguese: Aventure-se e limpe The Wilds das temíveis cobras e de sua mestra, a Mãe da Toca de Duplo Ataque. Abrir uma passagem lhe dará o espaço necessário para respirar e se preparar para o que está por vir.

English: Should a mere handful of these snakes cast doubt upon your resolve, the prospect of facing Beast King Khan becomes a distant dream!
Portuguese: Se um simples punhado dessas cobras lançar dúvidas sobre sua determinação, a perspectiva de enfrentar o Rei das Feras Khan se torna um sonho distante!

English: With the serpents vanquished, your valor shines brightly, hero. Savor a brief rest, but keep your mind sharp, for another battle awaits when you re-enter the untamed Wilds!
Portuguese: Com as serpentes derrotadas, sua bravura brilha intensamente, herói. Saboreie um breve descanso, mas mantenha sua mente afiada, pois outra batalha aguarda quando você retornar às selvagens Wilds!

English: Stay focused, adventurer. Venture back to the Wilds, and press on until the Prismatic Cobras and Twinstrike Den Mother are no more.
Portuguese: Mantenha o foco, aventureiro. Volte para as Wilds e continue até que as Cobras Prismáticas e a Mãe da Toca de Duplo Ataque sejam derrotadas.

English: Defeat 60 Prismatic Cobra, the Twinstrike Den Mother, then 60 Twinstrike Cobra.
Portuguese: Derrote 60 Cobras Prismáticas, a Mãe da Toca de Duplo Ataque, e depois 60 Cobras de Duplo Ataque.

English: Tale of Tanuki
Portuguese: História de Tanuki

English: The fight through the Wilds has only just begun. Armed with your newfound experience in the Wilds, you're ready to confront something even more perilous.
Portuguese: A luta pelas Wilds apenas começou. Armado com sua nova experiência nas Wilds, você está pronto para enfrentar algo ainda mais perigoso.

English: Return to the Wilds and face the army of Tanuki warriors who stand as guardians of the King's lush garden.
Portuguese: Retorne às Wilds e enfrente o exército de guerreiros Tanuki que se erguem como guardiões do exuberante jardim do Rei.

English: The last fight certainly tested your mettle. Rest for a while, and let me know when you are ready to proceed.
Portuguese: A última luta certamente testou sua coragem. Descanse por um tempo e me avise quando estiver pronto para continuar.

English: The King's army has begun to dwindle! Only the most powerful of his guardians remain to defend him.
Portuguese: O exército do Rei começou a diminuir! Apenas os mais poderosos de seus guardiões permanecem para defendê-lo.

English: You're so close to victory adventurer, do not give up hope. Defeat the Tanuki, and march ever closer to the King's chambers.
Portuguese: Você está tão perto da vitória, aventureiro, não perca a esperança. Derrote os Tanuki e marche cada vez mais perto das câmaras do Rei.

English: Defeat 60 Tanuki Enforcer and the Tanuki Protector.
Portuguese: Derrote 60 Executores Tanuki e o Protetor Tanuki.

English: Defying the Mystic Monarch
Portuguese: Desafiando o Monarca Místico

English: The time has come to face King Beast Khan's most powerful allies!
Portuguese: Chegou a hora de enfrentar os aliados mais poderosos do Rei das Feras Khan!

English: Deep within the camp of the Wildwoods dwells a potent species of beast known as the Wildwood Stalkers. They are lead by the mysterious Wildwood Shaman, a being believed to imbue them with corrupted magics.
Portuguese: No fundo do acampamento dos Wildwoods habita uma espécie potente de besta conhecida como Perseguidores Wildwood. Eles são liderados pelo misterioso Xamã Wildwood, uma entidade que se acredita imbuir-los com magias corrompidas.

English: To challenge the Wildwood without being thoroughly prepared would be a grave mistake.
Portuguese: Desafiar os Wildwood sem estar totalmente preparado seria um grave erro.

English: The Wildwood have truly fallen!? Well done, hero! Only the King now stands in your path!
Portuguese: Os Wildwood realmente caíram!? Bem feito, herói! Agora apenas o Rei está no seu caminho!

English: The Wildwood are a fearsome species. Persevere, and keep pressing forward!
Portuguese: Os Wildwood são uma espécie temível. Persevere e continue avançando!

English: Defeat 60 Wildwood Stalker and the Wildwood Shaman.
Portuguese: Derrote 60 Perseguidores Wildwood e o Xamã Wildwood.

English: Conquering the King
Portuguese: Conquistando o Rei

English: Beast King Khan, the sovereign of the Wilds, holds dominion over all the untamed creatures dwelling within its depths. His fury befalls any who dare venture too close to his inner sanctum.
Portuguese: O Rei das Feras Khan, o soberano das Wilds, detém domínio sobre todas as criaturas indomadas que habitam suas profundezas. Sua fúria recai sobre qualquer um que se atreva a se aventurar muito perto de seu santuário interno.

English: Legend speaks of the King's chambers as housing extraordinary treasures, granting those who uncover them unparalleled power. Are you prepared to test the truth of these legends?
Portuguese: A lenda fala das câmaras do Rei como abrigando tesouros extraordinários, concedendo àqueles que os descobrem um poder incomparável. Você está preparado para testar a veracidade dessas lendas?

English: Your time has come to confront the King, hero. Stand against the mighty King Beast Khan, and collect the spoils of your brave endeavors!
Portuguese: Chegou a sua hora de confrontar o Rei, herói. Enfrente o poderoso Rei das Feras Khan e colete os despojos de seus bravos esforços!

English: Take all the time you require to make your preparations. The Beast King will surely remain within.
Portuguese: Tome todo o tempo necessário para fazer seus preparativos. O Rei das Feras certamente permanecerá dentro.

English: Astounding, hero! You've vanquished the very King of Beasts himself!
Portuguese: Espantoso, herói! Você derrotou o próprio Rei das Feras!

English: Return to me if you emerge victorious against Beast King Khan.
Portuguese: Volte para mim se você sair vitorioso contra o Rei das Feras Khan.

English: Collect the Oversized Heart from Beast King Khan.
Portuguese: Colete o Coração Gigante do Rei das Feras Khan.

English: Flyff's 20 year anniversary
Portuguese: Flyff's 20 year anniversary

English: The Beginnings
Portuguese: The Beginnings

English: Happy 20 year anniversary! Why don't you let me take you on a leisurely trip through a little history in celebration? As a reward, my mayor friends and I will reward you with a special glow.
Portuguese: Happy 20 year anniversary! Why don't you let me take you on a leisurely trip through a little history in celebration? As a reward, my mayor friends and I will reward you with a special glow.

English: The rest of the city mayors and I will guide you through some iconic Flyff experiences, and tell you about some milestones.
Portuguese: The rest of the city mayors and I will guide you through some iconic Flyff experiences, and tell you about some milestones.

English: The first and biggest milestone this 20 year old game hit was the grand opening, this month 20 years ago in Japan!
Portuguese: The first and biggest milestone this 20 year old game hit was the grand opening, this month 20 years ago in Japan!

English: As you might expect, the world of Madrigal looked quite different at that time... I was still a newly elected mayor! My only friends were the mayors of Saint City and Darken back then.
Portuguese: As you might expect, the world of Madrigal looked quite different at that time... I was still a newly elected mayor! My only friends were the mayors of Saint City and Darken back then.

English: You know, the only continents that were formed at that time were Flaris, Saint Morning, The Garden of Rhisis, and Darkon 1. If you'd like to see some pictures, check out the article on our website.
Portuguese: You know, the only continents that were formed at that time were Flaris, Saint Morning, The Garden of Rhisis, and Darkon 1. If you'd like to see some pictures, check out the article on our website.

English: Now, why don't you go kill some Aibatts for old time's sake and come back to me?
Portuguese: Now, why don't you go kill some Aibatts for old time's sake and come back to me?

English: I'll be waiting!
Portuguese: I'll be waiting!

English: Well, that's a shame. Happy anniversary anyway!
Portuguese: Well, that's a shame. Happy anniversary anyway!

English: Nice! This is nostalgic... It's been a while since I've seen an Aibatt kill mission.
Portuguese: Nice! This is nostalgic... It's been a while since I've seen an Aibatt kill mission.

English: Go ahead and meet with the mayor of Saint City. He's a great storyteller.
Portuguese: Go ahead and meet with the mayor of Saint City. He's a great storyteller.

English: Kill the Aibatts the mayor of Flarine told you about.
Portuguese: Kill the Aibatts the mayor of Flarine told you about.

English: Hello there. My friend in Flarine said you'd be coming. Now... where was the story?
Portuguese: Hello there. My friend in Flarine said you'd be coming. Now... where was the story?

English: Right. You just killed some Aibatts, and while that's something everyone is familiar with, there are some experiences that the veterans only know about.
Portuguese: Right. You just killed some Aibatts, and while that's something everyone is familiar with, there are some experiences that the veterans only know about.

English: Were you around when you had to level your skills by using them?! Yep, different world back then.
Portuguese: Were you around when you had to level your skills by using them?! Yep, different world back then.

English: Have you ever had to repair your weapon? Until the 9th version of Flyff, players like yourself had to repair their weapons over time...
Portuguese: Have you ever had to repair your weapon? Until the 9th version of Flyff, players like yourself had to repair their weapons over time...

English: As a matter of fact... I happen to have an 18 year old relic of mine which I never got to repair! My friend Bulrox used to love these things. Why don't you give it to him for me, as an Anniversary gift?
Portuguese: As a matter of fact... I happen to have an 18 year old relic of mine which I never got to repair! My friend Bulrox used to love these things. Why don't you give it to him for me, as an Anniversary gift?

English: I hope he still has the equipment to repair it, it's a sentimental piece... After you give it to Bulrox, the mayor of Darken will have some more to tell you.
Portuguese: I hope he still has the equipment to repair it, it's a sentimental piece... After you give it to Bulrox, the mayor of Darken will have some more to tell you.

English: Ah. He probably doesn't have the equipment for it anymore anyway.
Portuguese: Ah. He probably doesn't have the equipment for it anymore anyway.

English: Wow! I never thought I'd see one of these in this condition again! This is an incredible gift for a weapons' master, I'll be spending all my time off work fixing this.
Portuguese: Wow! I never thought I'd see one of these in this condition again! This is an incredible gift for a weapons' master, I'll be spending all my time off work fixing this.

English: Deliver the broken Wooden Sword to Bulrox, as a gift from the mayor.
Portuguese: Deliver the broken Wooden Sword to Bulrox, as a gift from the mayor.

English: An Old Gift From an Old Friend
Portuguese: An Old Gift From an Old Friend

English: Happy 20th to us! Now that we've looked back on the last 20 years, we arrive to today. Flyff Universe was launched in May of 2022, and brings Madrigal to many different corners of the world.
Portuguese: Happy 20th to us! Now that we've looked back on the last 20 years, we arrive to today. Flyff Universe was launched in May of 2022, and brings Madrigal to many different corners of the world.

English: As we continue to appreciate Flyff and its memories over the next 20 years, why don't you do one final, iconic task for me?
Portuguese: As we continue to appreciate Flyff and its memories over the next 20 years, why don't you do one final, iconic task for me?

English: I want you to head back to flaris and speak with Mr. Flyff, right after you kill some Mothbees on your flying device!
Portuguese: I want you to head back to flaris and speak with Mr. Flyff, right after you kill some Mothbees on your flying device!

English: He's waiting for you!
Portuguese: He's waiting for you!

English: He's going to wait for another 20 years, no problem.
Portuguese: He's going to wait for another 20 years, no problem.

English: Welcome back! As promised, here's your token of participation, wear it proudly.
Portuguese: Welcome back! As promised, here's your token of participation, wear it proudly.

English: To The Skies, For Fun!
Portuguese: To The Skies, For Fun!

English: Kill the Mothbees and return to Mr. Flyff.
Portuguese: Kill the Mothbees and return to Mr. Flyff.
